mainContent.tapMenuToAccessProjects: Tap the menu button above to access projects
mainContent.createNewProjectTip: Create a new project by clicking the folder icon in the sidebar
mainContent.projectDescription: Select a project from the sidebar to start coding with Claude. Each project contains your chat sessions and file history.
mainContent.mobileTip: Tap the menu button above to access projects
mainContent.desktopTip: Create a new project by clicking the folder icon in the sidebar

homepage.title: Synapse Core
homepage.subtitle: AI Agent Platform Empowering Enterprises

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?

register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long

emptyState.title: Start a conversation

permissionMode.defaultDescription: Dangerous operations need confirmation for safety
permissionMode.acceptEditsDescription: Auto-accept file edits suggested by AI
permissionMode.bypassPermissionsDescription: No permission checks, all operations allowed (use caution)
permissionMode.planDescription: Plan without executing, review before running

agents.title: Agent Settings
agents.description: Configure AI model behavior and permissions
agents.permissionDescription: Control how Claude interacts with your files and system
agents.mcpServersDescription: Manage Model Context Protocol servers for extended capabilities

appearance.darkModeDescription: Toggle between light and dark themes
appearance.projectSortingDescription: How projects are ordered in the sidebar
appearance.editorThemeDescription: Default theme for the code editor
appearance.wordWrapDescription: Enable word wrapping by default in the editor
appearance.showMinimapDescription: Display a minimap for easier navigation in diff view
appearance.showLineNumbersDescription: Display line numbers in the editor

apiKeys.confirmDeleteKey: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
apiKeys.confirmDeleteToken: Are you sure you want to delete this GitHub token?
apiKeys.externalApiDescription: Learn how to use the external API to trigger Claude/Cursor sessions from your applications.

projectCreation.title: Create New Project
projectCreation.projectNameHint: Use letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only
projectCreation.infoCard: A new folder will be created in your workspace with this name. You can start coding with Claude right away!

error.nameExists: A project with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.
